messageBody:
Ellen, Pete,

The patch I sent in,
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&aid=436182&group_id=15278&atid=315278
, contains a unit test to demonstrate the problem.

To see it, change the line in CleaningTestSetupTest.java from

static class SomeCleaningTestSetup extends CleaningTestSetup {

to

static class SomeCleaningTestSetup extends TestSetup {

, which will run the same test with a TestSetup implementation. The
test will fail for test cases when the setUp method throws an
exception because setUp, the tests, and tearDown are called inside the
same Protectable bubble.

Dave
